title: sadhanandha bhakthi
sahitya:
sadAnanda bhakti tandu sAmI enaiyAL kanda



anupallavi



udAra gunashIla uc-cita sad cidAnanda shivabAla



caraNam



guhapriya vara raghupriyAkara kumara guruparA nal aghapriya guha mahAprabhO

manjula mangalakarA mujjaga prabhO Arumukha prabhO sundara pannirukarA

mighu sukhaprada kavi kunjaradAsa manOhara suravara
